verses.verse: יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> There is רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> an evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> which I have seen תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun וְרַבָּ֥ה <S%H7227><s%> and it [is] common הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> among הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> among men

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to whom יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> hath given ל֣וֹ הָאֱלֹהִ֡ים <S%H430><s%> to whom God עֹשֶׁר֩ <S%H6239><s%> riches וּנְכָסִ֨ים <S%H5233><s%> wealth וְכָב֜וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and honour וְֽאֵינֶ֨נּוּ <S%H369><s%> nothing חָסֵ֥ר <S%H2638><s%> so that he wanteth לְנַפְשׁ֣וֹ ׀ <S%H5315><s%> nothing for his soul מִכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to whom יִתְאַוֶּ֗ה <S%H183><s%> of all that he desireth וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not יַשְׁלִיטֶ֤נּוּ <S%H7980><s%> giveth him not power הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> yet God לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> to eat מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man נָכְרִ֖י <S%H5237><s%> A foreigner יֹֽאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <S%H398><s%> eateth זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> This הֶ֛בֶל <S%H1892><s%> it this [is] vanity וָחֳלִ֥י <S%H2483><s%> disease רָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> and it [is] an evil הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> beget אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If a man מֵאָ֡ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וְשָׁנִים֩ <S%H8141><s%> years רַבּ֨וֹת <S%H7227><s%> many יִֽחְיֶ֜ה <S%H2421><s%> [children] and live וְרַ֣ב ׀ <S%H7227><s%> be many שֶׁיִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> have יְמֵֽי־ <S%H3117><s%> so that the days שָׁנָ֗יו <S%H8141><s%> of his years וְנַפְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H5315><s%> and his soul לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not תִשְׂבַּ֣ע <S%H7646><s%> be not filled מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> with good וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> even קְבוּרָ֖ה <S%H6900><s%> and also [that] he have no burial לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָ֣יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> have לּ֑וֹ אָמַ֕רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I say ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] better מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> than הַנָּֽפֶל׃ <S%H5309><s%> [that] an untimely birth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> in בַהֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> in with vanity בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> For he cometh וּבַחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in darkness יֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and goes וּבַחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> with darkness שְׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> and his name יְכֻסֶּֽה׃ <S%H3680><s%> shall be covered

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> the sun לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> never רָאָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> Moreover he hath not seen וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> never יָדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> nor known נַ֥חַת <S%H5183><s%> hath more rest לָזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> [any thing] this מִזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> than

וְאִלּ֣וּ <S%H432><s%> Yea though חָיָ֗ה <S%H2421><s%> he live אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> years פַּעֲמַ֔יִם <S%H6471><s%> twice וְטוֹבָ֖ה <S%H2896><s%> no good לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not רָאָ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> [told] yet hath he seen הֲלֹ֛א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מָק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> country אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> to one הַכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner הוֹלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> do not all go

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עֲמַ֥ל <S%H5999><s%> All the labour הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man לְפִ֑יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> [is] for his mouth וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and yet הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and yet the appetite לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not תִמָּלֵֽא׃ <S%H4390><s%> is not filled

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יּוֹתֵ֥ר <S%H3148><s%> more לֶחָכָ֖ם <S%H2450><s%> For what hath the wise מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> have over הַכְּסִ֑יל <S%H3684><s%> foolish מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what לֶּעָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> the poor יוֹדֵ֔עַ <S%H3045><s%> that knoweth לַהֲלֹ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> to walk נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before הַחַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> age

ט֛וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Better מַרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> [is] the sight עֵינַ֖יִם <S%H5869><s%> of the eyes מֵֽהֲלָךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> than the wandering נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> of the desire גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> This הֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> this [is] also vanity וּרְע֥וּת <S%H7469><s%> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> of spirit

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long שֶּֽׁהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> exists כְּבָר֙ <S%H3528><s%> already נִקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> bewray שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> and it וְנוֹדָ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> and it is known אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> that it [is] man וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither יוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> neither may לָדִ֔ין <S%H1777><s%> he contend עִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> with [שֶׁהַתְקִיף כ] (שֶׁתַּקִּ֖יף <S%H8630><s%> prevail ק) מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For יֵשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> Seeing there be דְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> things הַרְבֵּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> many מַרְבִּ֣ים <S%H7235><s%> that increase הָ֑בֶל <S%H1892><s%> vanity מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יֹּתֵ֖ר <S%H3148><s%> is the advantage לָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> what [is] man

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> who יוֹדֵעַ֩ <S%H3045><s%> For who knoweth מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what טּ֨וֹב <S%H2896><s%> what [is] good לָֽאָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> for man בַּֽחַיִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> in [this] life מִסְפַּ֛ר <S%H4557><s%> all יְמֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> the days חַיֵּ֥י <S%H2416><s%> life הֶבְל֖וֹ <S%H1892><s%> of his vain וְיַעֲשֵׂ֣ם <S%H6213><s%> which he spendeth כַּצֵּ֑ל <S%H6738><s%> A shadow אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> for יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> tell לָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> a man מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> what shall be after תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> east side
